website_summaries.verdict: A great ski for kids. At 55", they are easy to handle and have a wide surface to give a beginner balance.
pros: Wide at the tip and the tail for easier balance on the water
Includes a bar to help kids keep skis parallel while learning
Bar is removable after the child learns to get up on his own
Small boots can adjust down to child size four
cons: Small boots might be hard to fit kids who are big enough to take on the adult-size skis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a 9 year old!
customer_reviews.text: Bought theses for our 9year old granddaughter as her feet were slipping out of our full size skies. The removable bar was just the trick to get her up on the second try. Take care with the thumb screws that attach the bar. I did not and dropped one in the lake....that ended that weeks lesson. I called Connelly and they quickly sent a replacement at no charge! We have 5 younger grandchildren so these trainers will be kept busy for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Yanmarguy

customer_reviews.title: Up on the first attempt!
customer_reviews.text: These skis worked great with my 7 year old son! He got up on his first attempt and every attempt thereafter. We even removed the stabilizer bar after awhile and he was successful on those attempts as well. He likes to use the stabilizer bar as he feels extremely confident and puts on a show (touching the water with his hand, skiing one handed, bouncing, and more)!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT size!
customer_reviews.text: If your child is a little too big for the 48" beginner skis that are everywhere, these are a MAJOR step up, but not so big that a kid can't use them like a 60" teen ski is. My son is 11 and weighs about 93 lbs. He couldn't get up on the 48" and I decided it was because they were too small. The next weekend he got right up with these with the bar in place. We stayed at the lake that week on vacation. By the end of the week he had dropped a ski and slalomed all the way around the lake! OUTSTANDING!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: lawdog

customer_reviews.title: Hurt feet
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a 2nd pair so my 9 & 12 yr old boys could ski together. The boots are so tight they hurt as soon as they put them on. They leave red marks. My boys are both are slim with narrow feet. Our other Rave sports pair are much more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: DF

customer_reviews.title: Great skis for kids to learn on
customer_reviews.text: Both of my kids quickly learned to ski with these. The included bar was awesome for them keeping their skis together and we only used that bar for the first time or two and then its never been touched again. Now onto trying to drop a ski. These provided exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality Connely Skiis
customer_reviews.text: These skiis are great! All four of our grandchildren ages 10, 9, 8, and 7 were able to get up on the first day--two of them on their first try. The bar stabilized the skiis and they popped right up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Love these. My 8 year old grandson loves them. He and a 6 year old cousin learned to ski this summer and these were perfect. Well built.
customer_reviews.author: J. Weber

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for learning to ski
customer_reviews.text: I have taught 2 7 year olds how to ski on these and they get up NO PROBLEM. These are perfect for probably 7-11 or 12 year olds who need the extra surface area. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Adams

customer_reviews.title: These skis were very easy for the children to learn how to ski
customer_reviews.text: These skis were very easy for the children to learn how to ski. Both children who tried it (ages 11 and 9) got up and skied on their second try. Having them bolted together eliminated the frustration that normally accompanies teaching children to ski.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set of skis.
customer_reviews.text: The skis haven't been used yet, but they are very well made and I don't doubt they'll help my grandsons learn to ski this summer.
customer_reviews.author: Marydalefarms

product_meta.title: Connelly Supersport Combo Waterskis
product_meta.description: We engineered shaped skis to make skiing easier and more fun for everyone. A wide nose and tail make it easier to get up and out of the water on deep water starts. Narrow Width underfoot keeps them responsive and playful. This concept is downsized to make the super sport pair. Smaller, lighter skiers will gain confidence and enjoy the ride more on properly sized gear. Jr. Size heel-slide adjustable bindings fit most kid's feet giving them more control of the ski. Beginners can use the front stabilizer bar to keep the skis in line and the proper distance apart.
